game.s_dis: Dungeons & Dragons: Eye of the Beholder for GBA is a first-person dungeon-crawling RPG where players explore Waterdeep’s depths, form a party of heroes, and battle the evil Zanithar.
game.l_dis:
Play Dungeons & Dragons: Eye of the Beholder GBA Online – Classic Dungeon RPG

Dungeons & Dragons: Eye of the Beholder for the Game Boy Advance brings classic D&D dungeon-crawling to handheld form. Based on the original PC game, this version combines real-time exploration and tactical turn-based combat as players delve deep into the dungeons beneath Waterdeep to uncover dark secrets and defeat the beholder Zanithar.

About Dungeons & Dragons: Eye of the Beholder

Players assemble a party of up to six adventurers, choosing from classic D&D races and classes. The GBA version uses a modified 3rd Edition rule set, offering a balance between accessibility and depth. You’ll navigate mazes in a first-person perspective, solve puzzles, and engage in tactical, grid-based battles from an isometric view.

Gameplay Features

  • Classic D&D Party System: Create and customize up to six heroes with different classes and abilities.
  • Dual Perspectives: Explore in first-person and battle in an isometric, turn-based mode.
  • Rich Dungeon Exploration: Traverse the sprawling dungeons of Waterdeep filled with traps, monsters, and treasures.
  • Strategic Combat: Plan attacks, cast spells, and manage resources to survive deep into the underworld.
  • Authentic D&D Feel: Faithfully adapted from tabletop rules for portable play.

How to Play Online

You can play Dungeons & Dragons: Eye of the Beholder online in your browser with no downloads required. Build your adventuring party, explore Waterdeep, and relive a legendary RPG experience anywhere.

Why Play Eye of the Beholder?

  • Classic Dungeon Experience: A faithful translation of the D&D atmosphere and lore.
  • Strategic Party Building: Customize your heroes to face increasingly tough enemies.
  • Portable Adventure: Enjoy the classic D&D experience anywhere with save support.

Summary

Dungeons & Dragons: Eye of the Beholder offers a rich and challenging RPG experience on the Game Boy Advance, mixing strategy, exploration, and the fantasy depth of D&D. Build your party, master your spells, and descend into the darkness of Waterdeep — adventure awaits!
